channel.title: Flax Picker
channel.description:
Anyone have a good flax picker?
Imp_flax often does a weird thing where your character will randomly walk back and forth between the individual flax patches, but only pick one at a time, then pace around and pick one more... finally banking after 99.99 hours lol.
/flax was a super good script but now doesn't seem to work, possibly due to the new coordinate changes?
pick_flax is decently efficiently yet is pretty slow compared to the previous two.
Any help is appreciated! :D[br][size=1]Posted at: April 26, 2006, 12:53:49 pm[/size][hr]Update: script "pickFlax" can't even find the damn bank lol.

Anyways scripts are made from scratch therfore NOT illegal

side note : impflax only works on slave bot,buy slave and get the updated one…
